Lamont Allen Warren (born January 4, 1973) is an American former professional football running back. He was selected 164th overall in the sixth round of the 1994 NFL draft. He played in the National Football League (NFL) for eight seasons with the Indianapolis Colts, New England Patriots, and Detroit Lions.
